Commentary.ab: Y12.3a †manaēibiiō] Ir. cod. (Ind. cod. maniiaēibiiō); Geldner, Kellens maniiaēibiiō. Humbach, 1955 pp. 48-49 *dmāniia-. Corrupted form from *dmāna-?

Y12.3a rā̊ŋhē] problemaitc form. Either 1st. sg. aor. subj. med. with err. correction *-āi to -ē, or 1st. sg. aor. opt. med., but IIr. *-i̭a > -ē not expected. Furthermore, ŋ́ hardly attested (mss. 110, 4020, 4162) and likely influenced by ending -ē, as in dat. sg. of ah-stems -ŋ́he.
Y12.3b āiia. zəmā] Kellens (Bartholomae); Geldner āiia.zəmā. Cf. Y9.15.
Y12.3b š́iieiṇtī] Kellens (Bartholomae); Geldner š́iieṇtī. Cf. Y4.4, Y5.2, etc.
Y12.3e uštānahe] sec. cod.; Geldner, Kellens uštānahē.

Parallels.ab: yāiš upairī āiia zəmā gaōbīš š́iieiṇtī ~ Y5.2, Y37.2, VrS65.34 yōi gə̄uš hacā š́iieiṇtī.
nōit̰ aɱāt̰ ā ziienīm nōit̰ vīuuāpəm xštā māzdaiiasnīš auui vīsō ~ Y12.7 us (stuiiē) māzdaiiasninąm vīšąm ziiānaiiat̰ca vīuuāpat̰ca.
māzdaiiasnīš auui vīsō = VS18.12; ~ Y68.15 vīse māzdaiiasne; ~ VS19.12 vīsat̰ yat̰ māzdaiiasnōḭt̰.
